Job Title: Bookkeeper - Quickbooks

Location: Maryville, TN

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Accounting/Auditing, Finance

Description:
US Tanx

Bookkeeper - Quickbooks / $25.0-$28.0 per hour / Maryville, TN Must Haves:Advanced proficiency in QuickBooks Online (Certification preferred)Experience in bookkeeping and accounting Perform with a high degree of accuracy, detail-orientedAbility to multi-task; great organizational skillsAble to work with a team Education: Associates Degree Why Us:

OUR CORE VALUES

RELIABILITY: Our talented and knowledgeable professionals are experts in their field and stay up-to-date on all certifications, and state & federal regulations.

AVAILABILITY: We are always available to serve and our teamis committed to helping you solve your problem.

COMMITMENT: We are committed to honesty, integrity, and professionalism in all our business practices all the while providing our customers with the best service possible.

QUALITY: Excellence in the field, a good safety record, and maintaining a financially strong organization are our cornerstones.

Job Description:

Join Our Team! Bookkeeper Opportunity

We are seeking a detail-oriented and experienced Bookkeeper to join our team in Maryville, Tennessee. As a key member of our finance department, you will be responsible for managing the financial records and transactions of our organization with precision and accuracy. The ideal candidate is proficient in QuickBooks Online, possesses a strong understanding of accounting principles, and thrives in a collaborative work environment.

Work Arrangement: In-office

Hours: Four-day week (Monday-Thursday), 32 hours per week

Office Hours: 9:00 am to 5:00 pm

Culture: Are you ready to kickstart your career in accounting? Join our vibrant and inclusive workplace culture that values collaboration, innovation, and diversity. We believe in fostering a team-driven environment where every member thrives. With a commitment to excellence and work-life balance, we offer opportunities for growth and a supportive atmosphere that ensures a fulfilling and dynamic experience.

About You: A self-starter with an entrepreneurial spirit eager to learn and grow.A creative problem-solver with a detail-oriented, out-of-the-box approach.Versatile and eager to take on new challenges.Excellent time management skills.Proficient in Microsoft Office Suite and QuickBooks Online (Required). Key Responsibilities: Execute bookkeeping tasks with guidance and support.Assist in ensuring accurate reconciliation of all bank accounts.Support cost analysis to provide insights into financial performance.Assist in tracking and optimizing the organization's cash flow.Learn to maintain accurate records of financial transactions.Assist in managing and streamlining inventory processes.Participate in analyzing financial statements and providing recommendations aligned with company goals.Learn to execute timely and accurate journal entries. Apply now and take the first step towards a fulfilling journey as our Bookkeeper.

About Us:

OUR GOAL IS SIMPLE, SOLVE YOUR PROBLEM THE FIRST TIME.

and to help you get the most out of your investment, and to keep you infull compliancewith all local, state, and federal guidelines. Keeping your fleet or customersâ€™ fuel systems clean is also a bonus of properly maintaining your fuel systems.

We are committed to honesty, integrity, and professionalism

In all our business practices all the while providing our customers with the best service possible. We strive to provide the highest quality consulting, engineering, testing, and inspection services.

Our talented and knowledgeable professionals are experts in their field and stay up-to-date on all certifications, and state & federal regulations.Excellence in the field, a good safety record, and maintaining a financially strong organization are our cornerstones.

We strive to honor God in all that we do and hold all our service professionals to thehighest standards in the field. We want to help you solve your problems.

We are located in Maryville, Tennessee, but we offer services throughout the southeast United States.
